wikipedia_page.main: Keith Rodger Hogg (born 27 January 1980) is a Scottish former professional footballer who has played in the Scottish Football League First Division for Ayr United.

response: In 1997, along with fellow starlets Keith Hogg, Neil Scally, Gareth "Bo" Armstrong and Joe Carruth, he enjoyed a spell on loan at Glenafton Athletic under Alan Rough which prepared him for the rough and tumble of Scottish football.
